batch_role: Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) for handling user submissions and algorithm responses in a coding platform.
key_features: Encapsulates user submission data and algorithm responses
Uses Java Records and Lombok for concise and immutable data representation
Provides static factory methods for DTO instantiation
Includes pagination and sorting information for submissions
Tracks submission statistics including counts and success rates
project_hints: Part of a submission management system for a coding platform or educational tool
Handles user submissions, algorithm responses, and related statistics
Involves competitive programming or coding challenges
